Hero.title: Hello
Hero.subtitle: I'm Vladyslav and I'm a software developer

About.title: About me
About.text: I am a dedicated and driven software engineer, I specialize in a range of technologies. With a fervent passion for technology and a relentless pursuit of excellence, I consistently strive to expand my programming prowess and stay at the forefront of industry trends. My journey in software development is characterized by a strong work ethic, exceptional communication skills, and an unwavering commitment to success. Equipped with an innate ability to adapt to new challenges, delivering innovative solutions that exceed expectations.

description.1: Developing new features and modifying existing one
description.2: Manage front-end development, which includes finding designers, adjusting existing designs, and communicating with back-end developers
Completed all preparation and implementation of the project
description.3: Learned and implemented new technologies required by this project such as Firebase and Algola
